title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2B.12 - In-Street and Overhead Pedestrian Crossing Signs (R1-6, R1-6a, R1-9, and R1-9a)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2B.12 - In-Street and Overhead Pedestrian Crossing Signs (R1-6, R1-6a, R1-9, and R1-9a)

State Regulations
INSERT the following paragraph: Standard: 00A The R1-6a and R1-9a signs shall not be used in New

York. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
